trans-unit.source: The <c>N:System.Speech.Synthesis</c> namespace contains classes for initializing and configuring a speech synthesis engine, for creating prompts, for generating speech, for responding to events, and for modifying voice characteristics.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <c>N:System.Speech.Synthesis</c> contém classes para inicializar e configurar um mecanismo de síntese de fala, para criar avisos, para gerar fala, para responder a eventos e para modificar características de voz.

trans-unit.source: **Initialize and Configure**
trans-unit.target: **Inicializar e configurar**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class provides access to the functionality of a speech synthesis engine that is installed on the host computer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe fornece acesso à funcionalidade de um mecanismo de síntese de fala está instalado no computador host.

trans-unit.source: Installed speech synthesis engines are represented by a voice, for example Microsoft Anna.
trans-unit.target: Instalado mecanismos são representados por uma voz, por exemplo Microsoft Anna a síntese de fala.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance initializes to the default voice.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instância inicializa a voz padrão.

trans-unit.source: To configure a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance to use one of the other installed voices, call the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instância para usar uma das outras instaladas vozes, chamada de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which voices are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre quais vozes estiverem instaladas, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can route the output of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> to a stream, a file, the default audio device, or to a null device by using one of the methods in the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class whose name begins with "`SetOutputTo`".
trans-unit.target: Você pode rotear a saída do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> para um fluxo, um arquivo, o dispositivo de áudio padrão ou para um dispositivo do nulo usando um dos métodos no <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe cujo nome começa com "`SetOutputTo`".

trans-unit.source: **Create Prompts**
trans-unit.target: **Criar solicitações**

trans-unit.source: Use one the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> class whose name begins with "`Append`" to build content for prompts from text, Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML), files containing text or SSML markup, or prerecorded audio files.
trans-unit.target: Use um os métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> classe cujo nome começa com "`Append`" para criar conteúdo de prompts de texto, fala síntese Markup Language (SSML), arquivos que contêm texto ou marcação SSML ou arquivos de áudio pré-gravados.

trans-unit.source: See [Constructing a Complex Prompt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [construir complexos Prompt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações e exemplos.

trans-unit.source: **Generate Speech**
trans-unit.target: **Gerar fala**

trans-unit.source: To generate speech from a string or from a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar fala a partir de uma cadeia de caracteres ou um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.Prompt> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: To generate speech from SSML markup, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar fala de marcação SSML, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: See [Speech Synthesis Markup Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94) for a guide to SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [referência de linguagem de marcação de síntese de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0c51279e-84d2-4f73-a924-8832039abf94) para um guia para marcação SSML.

trans-unit.source: You can guide the pronunciation of words by using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A> methods, and by adding or removing lexicons for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fornecer a pronúncia de palavras usando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithHint%2A> ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendTextWithPronunciation%2A> métodos e adicionando ou removendo dicionários para um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> instância usando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.AddLexicon%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.RemoveLexicon%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: **Respond to Events**
trans-unit.target: **Responder a eventos**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class includes events that inform a speech application that the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> encountered a specific feature in a prompt, as reported by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe inclui eventos que informam um aplicativo de fala que o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> encontrou um recurso específico em um prompt, conforme relatado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakProgressEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PhonemeReachedEventArgs>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VisemeReachedEventArgs> classes.

trans-unit.source: To get information about the beginning and end of the speaking of a prompt by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> classes.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o início e fim da fala de um prompt, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>, use o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakCompletedEventArgs> classes.

trans-unit.source: See [Using Speech Synthesis Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09bf41e6-b88c-4ff2-9287-e42bfd38d836) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [usando eventos de síntese de fala](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09bf41e6-b88c-4ff2-9287-e42bfd38d836) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações e exemplos.

trans-unit.source: **Modify Voice Characteristics**
trans-unit.target: **Modificar as características de voz**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle> class and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendText%2A> methods let you modify characteristics of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> voice using <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Emphasis%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Rate%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Volume%2A> parameters.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle> classe e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartStyle%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.AppendText%2A> métodos permitem que você modifique características de um <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> voz usando <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Emphasis%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Rate%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle.Volume%2A> parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: To modify characteristics of a voice such as culture, age, and gender, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> class or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> class.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar as características de uma voz como cultura, idade e sexo, use um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> classe ou o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> classe.

trans-unit.source: See [Controlling Voice Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fa3f10d-2696-4701-9735-68c59ffe4816) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [controlando atributos de voz](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0fa3f10d-2696-4701-9735-68c59ffe4816) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações.
